data.title: Stars' first husbands revealed
data.meta_description: See Angelina Jolie, Kim Kardashian, Scarlett Johansson and more stars' first husbands revealed.
data.text:
It's no secret that a lasting marriage in Hollywood is hard to come by. It's hardly uncommon for celebs to say "I do" more than once — so Wonderwall.com is uncovering some of our favorite female celebs' first husbands… starting with Angelina Jolie. The enigmatic actress-philanthropist was most recently wed to Brad Pitt until she started divorce proceedings in September 2016. The exes married in 2014 and share six children together. She's been publicly single since. Before that, Angelina was married to Billy Bob Thornton from 2000 to 2003. Read on to see her first husband revealed, as well as more celebs' first marriages.

RELATED: Celeb splits of 2017

Angelina Jolie was just 21 years old in 1996 when she married her first husband, actor Jonny Lee Miller. The two met on the set of the film "Hackers" and later divorced in 1999. The exes are still on good terms. In a 2014 interview with BuzzFeed, Angelina said she looks back tenderly on her experience filming "Hackers" and her relationship with Jonny: "That's where I met Jonny, who is still a great friend. I think of him when I think of that. Although I'm sure the movie looks so ancient now, but we had a lot of fun making that."

RELATED: Angie and Brad: Their romance in photos

Jennifer Aniston said "I do" to Justin Theroux in August 2015. She told Marie Claire in December 2016 why Justin is the right guy for her: "All I know is that I feel completely seen, and adored, in no matter what state. There's no part of me that I don't feel comfortable showing, exposing."

RELATED: Reese's hottest on-screen love interests ranked

Jennifer Aniston married Brad Pitt in 2000. Their incredibly high-profile union lasted until 2005.

Today, reality star Kim Kardashian West is married to rapper and fashion designer Kanye West. Kim and Kanye wed in May 2016, and they share daughter North and son Saint. Additionally, the glamorous couple reportedly have a third baby due via surrogate in January 2018. She was married to her second husband, NBA star Kris Humphries, for 72 days in 2011.

Kim Kardashian West's first husband was Damon Thomas, a music producer to whom she was married from 2000 to 2004. She eloped with him when she was just 19 years old — and their marriage was a tumultuous one. When Kim filed for divorce, she alleged she'd endured physical and emotional abuse during their union.

Reese Witherspoon tied the knot with talent agent Jim Toth at her ranch in Ojai, California, in 2011. They share a son, Tennessee.

Before Reese Witherspoon married Jim Toth, she was Mrs. Ryan Phillippe from 1999 to 2007. Reese met Ryan at her 21st birthday party in 1997 and they later co-starred in the 1999 cult classic "Cruel Intentions." The exes share teenagers Ava and Deacon.

These days, iconic 58-year-old artist Madonna is dating 31-year-old model Kevin Sampaio. Madonna was married to second husband Guy Ritchie from 2001 to 2008. They share two sons, Rocco and David.

It was the epitome of '80s love: Madonna was married to Sean Penn from 1985 to 1989.

Jennifer Lopez is now happily dating Yankees heartthrob Alex Rodriguez, but the songstress has been married three times. She and third husband Marc Anthony were married from 2004 to 2012 and share twins Max and Emme. Before that, she was briefly married to backup dancer Cris Judd from 2001 to 2002. (She was also briefly engaged to Ben Affleck!)

Jennifer Lopez's first husband was Cuban waiter Ojani Noa. The exes were married from 1997 to 1998.

Kate Winslet has been married three times! Currently, she's wed to Ned Rocknroll and has been since 2012. They share a son, Bear. The "Titanic" actress married her second husband, director Sam Mendes, in 2003 — but they divorced in 2011. Kate and Sam also share a son, Joe. Kate told the Wall Street Journal about the secrecy behind her divorces in September 2015, explaining, "No one really knows why my first marriage didn't last; no one knows why my second didn't. And I'm proud of those silences."

Kate's first marriage was to director Jim Threapleton. The exes married in 1998 and divorced in 2001. They share a daughter, Mia.

Scarlett Johansson is currently dating "Saturday Night Live" star Colin Jost. She split from French husband Romain Dauriac in January 2017 after two years of marriage. They share a daughter, Rose.

Before Ryan Reynolds became the husband of Blake Lively, he was the man candy on Scarlett Johansson's arm. The two were married from 2008 to 2011.

Carmen Electra is single, but she was in a relationship with second husband Dave Navarro of rock band Jane's Addiction from 2003 to 2007. In August 2017, she alluded to the possibility of them getting back together!

Before her marriage to Dave Navarro, Carmen Electra tied the knot with Dennis Rodman in Las Vegas in 1998. Unsurprisingly, they split just a year later.

Amy Poehler is not currently married, but she's dating New York City-based lawyer Benjamin Graf.

Previously, Amy Poehler was married to fellow actor-comedian Will Arnett from 2003 to 2012. The exes share two sons, Archie and Abel. Amy described the woes of divorce in her 2014 memoir "Yes, Please." She opined, "Getting a divorce really sucks. Imagine spreading everything you care about on a blanket and then tossing the whole thing up in the air. The process of divorce is about loading that blanket, throwing it up, watching it all spin and worrying what stuff will break when it lands."

Britney Spears has been dating model-personal trainer Sam Asghari since November 2017, but it's hard to forget her second marriage to Kevin Federline. Britney and K-Fed were married from 2004 to 2007 and even starred in a reality show, "Britney & Kevin: Chaotic," in 2005. They share sons Preston and Jayden.

Britney Spears' first union was short-lived, to say the least. In January 2004, she said "I do" to childhood friend Jason Alexander in a Las Vegas ceremony. The marriage, which lasted 55 hours, was annulled.

Supermodel Heidi Klum has been dating art dealer Vito Schnabel for more than three years now, but she's been married twice before! Heidi's marriage to second husband Seal fell apart in January 2012 after seven years of marriage. They share sons Henry and Johan and daughter Lou. In 2009, Seal officially adopted Heidi's daughter, Leni, from a previous relationship with Italian businessman Flavio Briatore.
